title: NantMobile Health Announces Positive Rating of Calio by iD™, the First Natural Language Health App Promoting Balanced Health and Lifestyle
text:
NantMobile Health Announces Positive Rating of Calio by iD™, the First Natural Language Health App Promoting Balanced Health and Lifestyle Only App with Intuitive Voice Interface, Enabling Consumers and Patients to Make Wiser Choices in Their Daily Diet and Exercise September 16, 2015 07:30 AM   
LOS ANGELES- NantMobile Health, a member of the NantWorks ecosystem of companies, today announced that its health, wellness and lifestyle management app, Calio by iD ™ (Calio), was independently reviewed and received a registered dietitian nutritionist (RDN) rating of 4 out of 5 in the September-October 2015 edition of Food and Nutrition Magazine . 
Calio, the first natural language app released by NantMobile Health, goes beyond merely a calorie counting application that focuses only on calorie intake, but seeks to promote a healthy and balanced lifestyle by allowing the individual seamless interaction and conversation with the app, enabling real time management of exercise, diet, health and lifestyle. 
The Calio app, available on the Apple App Store, features an extensive searchable database of foods, recipes, restaurant menu items, and exercises; the ability to track macronutrients and micronutrients, as well as physical activity; personalized health recommendations; and, quick inspirational tips for users to stay on track. Users have the flexibility to enter information by speaking, typing or scanning a bar code. More information can be found by visiting www.calioapp.com . The Calio app was released as Beta in March 2015 and with the positive user feedback received it will be ready for launch in its final consumer ready form by Nov 2015. 
“We developed our Calio app to empower the individual user to make wiser and more balanced health and nutrition choices on a daily basis,” said Fay Arjomandi, chief executive officer of NantMobile. “Using NantMobile's proprietary natural language processing technology , Calio is the only iOS app that enables consumers to effortlessly and naturally converse with the app to input their food and activities easily and quickly and track their nutrients and exercise. The app seamlessly integrates health and weight management goals into the user’s life.” 
Calio by iD was independently reviewed and rated four out of five stars in the September-October 2015 edition of Food and Nutrition Magazine , which is published by the Academy of Nutrition and Dietetics, the world’s largest organization of food and nutrition professionals. 
About NantMobile Health 
NantMobile Health, a member of the NantWorks ecosystem of companies, is committed to bringing consumer solutions to the health and wellness marketplace, empowering consumer and patients to take a more active role in the management of their day-to-day health, wellness, disease management and lifestyle decisions. NantMobile is developing a integrated series of mobile solutions utilizing the technology assets from the NantWorks ecosystem of companies in health, genomics and proteomics along with our patented augmented intelligence object and voice recognition technologies. For more information please visit www.nantmobilehealth.com .
